Class Leaf

  • java.lang.Object
    • danogl.GameObject
      • pepse.world.trees.Leaf
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RemovableObjects
    public class Leaf
extends danogl.GameObject
implements RemovableObjects
    Responsible for the creation and management of leaves.

        Parameters:
        topLeftCorner - Position of the object, in window coordinates (pixels). Note that (0,0) is the top-left corner of the window.
        dimensions - Width and height in window coordinates.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static void create​(danogl.util.Vector2 topLeftCorner,
                          danogl.collisions.GameObjectCollection gameObjects,
                          int layer,
                          int groundLayerToCollide)
        This method creates some leaves and initializes for each leaf its duration lifetime and its schedule.
        Parameters:
        topLeftCorner - Position of the object, in window coordinates (pixels).
        gameObjects - The collection of all participating game objects.
        layer - The number of the layer to which the created leaf should be added.
